column2: Are you sure you want to quit?
Watch an ad and double your reward!

column3: Pirate! I know you can’t wait to win to those Kitty Cats using our powerful Big Purrr Cat force
column4: but let me tell you the basics

column2: The 4 of us in your crew are in charge of different attacks inside the ship
One is in charge of the Basic Cannon
column3: tap on the middle of the screen to shoot it. You can shoot it as many times as you want

column2: Two are in charge of the Strong Cannons
column3: tap on the left or right of the screen to shoot them. They’re strong
column4: but you’ll need to wait for them to cool down before shooting again

column2: The other crew member is in charge of the Automatic Cannon
column5: so they’ll shoot it automatically from time to time.

column3: a cannon to surpass steel gear… the Big Purr Cannon
column5: just tap the button and you’ll see the real power of the ball of yarn
column6: it takes a long time to be ready
column7: so hang on while it’s loading.

column3: just remember the enemies may be different from time to time
column4: you’re gonna face some strong Pirate Cats and sometimes you’ll just find some Pirate School for Kitty Cats recently graduated kittie pirates which will be super easy to deal with…

column3: time to prove to them who is the number 1 Pirate Cat Crew!

column2: You see that red spot in the enemy ship’s windows? It means they’re having troubles there
column3: shoot it directly to cause bigger damage to they’re ship!

column4: the enemies are gonna drop boxes out of their ship
column5: they think that'll make them stay afloat (how cute kitties)
column6: shoot them to break them and keep their resources to you!
